title: I need my acc
body:
My acc is banned and u tell me to check my email for more information.sadly I don't have access to that email adress.please I need the account back I've been playing for a long time so long .Oce account
IGN = wreeda
Username=[REMOVED]



Please.consider this an apology.I don't know what I did wrong but I'll try to avoid It.
Contact me [REMOVED]
